hcclient.components.LocaleModal.title: Change Language
hcclient.components.JoinModal.title: Join Channel
hcclient.components.ChannelsModal.title: Your Channels
hcclient.components.ChannelsModal.emptyC: You have not joined any channels. . .
hcclient.components.UsersModal.title: Online Users
hcclient.components.StartScreen.tagline: Welcome to hack.chat, a minimal, distraction-free chat application.
hcclient.components.StartScreen.channelI: There are no channel lists, so a secret channel name can be used for private discussions.
hcclient.components.StartScreen.formatti: This client includes a full Markdown engine, use ```fencing``` to preserve whitespace.
Surround LaTeX with a dollar sign for inline style.
For syntax highlight, wrap the code like: ```[language] [the code]``` where [language] is any known programming language.
hcclient.components.StartScreen.thirdPar: Bots, Android clients, desktop clients, browser extensions, docker images, programming libraries, server modules and more:
hcclient.components.StartScreen.legal: Server and web client released under the WTFPL and MIT open source license. No message history is retained on the hack.chat server.
hcclient.containers.SettingsPage.header: Nothing to see here, bugger off
hclient.Generic.Errors.global.rateLimit: You are sending too much text. Wait a moment and try again. Press the up arrow key to restore your last message.
hclient.Generic.Errors.global.badNick: Nickname must consist of up to 24 letters, numbers, and underscores.
hclient.Generic.Errors.global.help: Refer to `/help {cmd}` for instructions on how to use this command.
hclient.Generic.Errors.global.unknownUse: Could not find user in that channel.
hclient.Generic.Errors.global.permsFail: You do not have permission to do this.
hclient.Generic.Errors.admin.saveFail: Failed to save config, check logs.
hclient.Generic.Errors.changeNick.rateLi: You are changing nicknames too fast. Wait a moment before trying again.
hclient.Generic.Errors.invite.rateLimit: You are sending invites too fast. Wait a moment before trying again.
hclient.Generic.Errors.join.rateLimit: You are joining channels too fast. Wait a moment and try again.
